The LORD<S>3068</S> reigneth<S>4427</S>, he is clothed<S>3847</S> with majesty<S>1348</S>; the LORD<S>3068</S> is clothed<S>3847</S> with strength<S>5797</S>, wherewith he hath girded<S>247</S> himself: the world<S>8398</S> also is stablished<S>3559</S>, that it cannot be moved<S>4131</S>.
Thy throne<S>3678</S> is established<S>3559</S> of old<S>227</S>: thou art from everlasting<S>5769</S>. <sup>of old: Heb. from then</sup>
The floods<S>5104</S> have lifted up<S>5375</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, the floods<S>5104</S> have lifted up<S>5375</S> their voice<S>6963</S>; the floods<S>5104</S> lift up<S>5375</S> their waves<S>1796</S>.
The LORD<S>3068</S> on high<S>4791</S> is mightier<S>117</S> than the noise<S>6963</S> of many<S>7227</S> waters<S>4325</S>, yea, than the mighty<S>117</S> waves<S>4867</S> of the sea<S>3220</S>.
Thy testimonies<S>5713</S> are very<S>3966</S> sure<S>539</S>: holiness<S>6944</S> becometh<S>4998</S> thine house<S>1004</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, for ever<S>753</S> <S>3117</S>. <sup>for ever: Heb. to length of days</sup>
